title: Venus Transit in the 4th House for Libra Ascendant
summary: When Venus transits the 4th house for Libra ascendant, comfort, emotional harmony, and domestic peace take priority. Home life becomes more pleasant, and relationships with family members soften through understanding and care. This period supports beautifying the home, improving living conditions, and nurturing inner stability. Property matters gain ease when approached diplomatically. However, excessive comfort-seeking or emotional dependence can reduce productivity if balance is not maintained.

sections.heading: Property & Assets
points: Favorable for buying decor or comforts

closing: This transit enhances inner comfort and family harmony. With balance, Venus creates a peaceful base without weakening ambition.
